channel.title: Safe zones
channel.description:
Ok its been ages since i last coded somthing lol... i forgot what the safe zone orders are in. do they go:
N-w XCOORD N-e XCOORD S-E YCOORD S-W YCOORD
i tried it that way and i only got 1 square as safe zone o.O

item.title: Safe zones
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

in client.java search for

pubic boolean nonWild

you should see

if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 )

Explaining

absX >= is the most Northeast X coord
absX <= is the most Southwest X Coord
absY >= is the most Northeast Y coord
absY <= is the most Southwest Y Coord

I hope i helped

Read full topic
